{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1110951,"totalDownVotes":118218,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":474073,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4209775,"totalDownVotes":768672,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":276289,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3758293,"totalDownVotes":309661,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":88899,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":895615,"totalDownVotes":57227,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE + 2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":51867,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"New Bloodline + Big changes:

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":606017,"totalDownVotes":46715,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":58867,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3221540,"totalDownVotes":281786,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":79953,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":523226,"totalDownVotes":36701,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":45319,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2762228,"totalDownVotes":362323,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":40367,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":262045,"totalDownVotes":33336,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":24104,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2069422,"totalDownVotes":286519,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":50025,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1016847,"totalDownVotes":51103,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":31286,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 18]:
- 💸SALE!

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2125969,"totalDownVotes":655811,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":70499,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4352219,"totalDownVotes":588868,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak 👀","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":31462,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👀


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":138881,"totalDownVotes":7721,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":17216,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2318348,"totalDownVotes":243554,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":58594,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1414506,"totalDownVotes":118715,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":30783,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Construye tu barco y zarpa hacia la aventura!

Beneficios del grupo:
✨Miembro✨ --- ¡25% más Oro!
💫Mega Miembro💫 --- ¡300% más vida! --- ¡25% más Oro!
🌟Miembro Royal🌟 --- ¡+4 Barriles de TNT! --- ¡300% más vida! --- ¡25% más Oro!"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":694061,"totalDownVotes":94330,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":21622,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money

🔥 And more!

Controls:
[E]: Open inventory

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":266683,"totalDownVotes":140875,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":24042,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1186306,"totalDownVotes":67738,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":18150,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1792813,"totalDownVotes":139913,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":9027,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":659781,"totalDownVotes":128011,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":8462,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Forma parte en un duelo por equipos 5v5 con una inmensa cantidad de armas y mapas alrededor de todo el
mundo.

Consigue creditos dentro del juego mediante eliminaciones y completando objetivos. Luego utiliza estos 
creditos para comprar nuevas armas, utilidad y granadas al principio de cada ronda."},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":220020,"totalDownVotes":19676,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":17386,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Club Roblox","placeId":3457390032,"playerCount":30433,"imageToken":"T_3457390032_bedf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏠 ROLEPLAY FAMILY HOME UPDATE!

"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":185589,"totalDownVotes":30506,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":7767,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Os testadores beta obtêm os caracteres dlc gratuitos.

Controles:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Bloco
Ataque Básico: Mouse1
Espaço + Mouse1: ataque aéreo
Combine ataques básicos e ataques aéreos para descobrir novos combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 para os movimentos especiais do seu personagem.
Transformação: G

Scripters: Snakeworl, jjjakey, Melon_Sensei
Construtores: Chicken_Man
Colaboradores: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA"},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":95890,"totalDownVotes":7776,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":9744,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
1,2,3,4- Character Skills
Jump + Left Click: Up Combo
Left Click In air: Air finish or simply use a move.

Inspired by Ani-Blox Legends, and All Star Tower Defense.

Owners: 123imnotm0mo and Yakrus
Developers: jacobman737, Lazarovip2,F33NY
Contributors: Swingset68, Arricku,Elikage,LightTheProtagonist, Rinanori"},{"creatorId":5446074,"creatorName":"Emotes CO.","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":148751,"totalDownVotes":12541,"universeId":2047210140,"name":"[NEW MAP | NEW EMOTES] 🕺 TTD 3","placeId":5771467270,"playerCount":18210,"imageToken":"T_5771467270_b633","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1730435200,"creatorName":"SnowdustDev","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":152106,"totalDownVotes":66864,"universeId":1852226622,"name":"Gacha Online| Custom OC RP⭐ (Roleplay)","placeId":5289509545,"playerCount":23171,"imageToken":"T_5289509545_1eec","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"➡️ Gacha Online's content is 100% free, supported by your donations and premium playtime! ⬅️

( Game Version 1.415 - 3/6/21 )

~~~~~~~ Welcome to Gacha Online BETA! ~~~~~~~ (*・ω・)ﾉ
Customize your Gacha OCs in Roblox, just like Gacha Life -- ⭐BUT MULTIPLAYER!⭐

Have fun Roleplaying, Exploring, and just hanging out with new friends!
-- Make Gacha Mini Movies live and with your friends!
-- Customize your characters right next to your buddies!
-- COMPLETELY FREE CUSTOMIZATION!
